meaning_str.bing:
n. 吸烟；抽烟
adj. 吸烟的；〈口〉(证据)凿；烟熏的；冒气的
adv. 冒着烟；冒着气
v. “smoke”的现在分词
网络. 冒烟；熏制

吸烟的；〈口〉(证据)凿；烟熏的；冒气的

吸烟的；冒烟的；冒气的；冒蒸汽的；燃烧的；烟熏的；烟雾缭绕的
烟熏；熏制（食物）；吸烟；抽烟；（smoke的现在分词）

1.en: I write quickly -- I go like the wind -- and can get up to 15 pages a day when I am really smoking.
1.cn: 我写作快速如风，当吸烟凝思时，能一天写上十五页。

2.en: I should note that none of what I wrote above is due to my own view on smoking.
2.cn: 我应当指出，我所写的以上内容同我对吸烟的看法毫无关系。

3.en: The newspaper did not say that Phelps was smoking marijuana, but it pointed out that the pipe typically was used for that purpose.
3.cn: 该报没有明确指出菲尔普斯在吸食大麻，但它指出照片中的烟枪显然是作此用途的。

0.en: Then through the big library, into the painted room, the drawing room, the smoking room, the great hall, in and out of the dining room and back outside.
0.cn: 然后去大书房，然后是休息室，客厅，吸烟室，大堂穿过餐厅就出去了。

1.en: What? Weed! I was smoking her out.
1.cn: 什么？大麻！我让她吸毒了。

2.en: She's helped so many people to quit smoking.

3.en: You're smoking again? Well, actually, yesterday I was smoking again. Today, I'm smoking still.
3.cn: 你又抽烟了？那是昨天，今天是“还在抽”。

4.en: All right, were you guys smoking something in the back of our van?
4.cn: 你们是不是躲在厢型车里偷抽了大麻？

5.en: So, Rach, how you doing? I'm great. No, with the not-smoking thing.
5.cn: 瑞秋，你还好吗？好极了。不，我是说戒烟的事。

6.en: Was it the smoking and the teenage sex? No. She was just real, I guess.
6.cn: 是关于抽烟和少年性行为？不，我觉得他很真实。

7.en: Oh man, she's so smoking, she has got the greatest set of... no guys around.
7.cn: 老兄，她好惹火她有一对最炫的…这儿没男的？

8.en: What the hell have you people been smoking out there? They're just goddamn trees!
8.cn: 你们这帮人到底是吃什么长大的啊？那不过是些树罢了。

9.en: Chandler. You're smoking? What are you doing? Hey, shut up. You're not my real Mom.
9.cn: 钱德，你抽烟？你怎么搞的？闭嘴，你又不是我的亲娘。

10.en: Now, are you sure? Everyone's smoking them. I think they're the best. I don't do drugs.
10.cn: 不用客气哦，这玩意大家都抽，我觉得这玩意爽爆了。我不碰毒。

11.en: Now to cook the marinated beef. Wok on, oil in. Wok is ready. It's smoking. In with the beef.
11.cn: 现在炒腌好的牛肉。放上锅，倒些油，锅热了，冒烟了，放入牛肉。

12.en: Actually, in Oklahoma smoking is legal in all common areas and offices with fewer than 15 people.
12.cn: 事实上，在奥克拉荷马，在少于十五人的办公室抽烟是合法的。

13.en: Oil in. Once it's nice and smoking, in with the egg. Now I'll just swirl this around a little bit.
13.cn: 放油，烧热冒烟了之后，放蛋液。把锅稍微转一转。

14.en: Your parents caught Ross smoking pot in college and he blamed it on me. Ross, I can't believe you'd do that.
14.cn: 罗斯大学时嗑药被他们逮到，他赖到了我身上。罗斯，你怎么这样。

15.en: Hey, can I ask you a question? Is it, "Where was the teacher?" She was in the bathroom smoking, that's where.
15.cn: 我能问你个问题吗？是要问"当时老师在哪儿"吗？她在洗手间抽烟呢，就是那儿。

16.en: Look, I'm telling you this is just like my parents divorce, which is when I started smoking in the first place.
16.cn: 我父母离婚时就像这样害我学会抽烟。

17.en: Oh. This? Healthy and organic jar of oregano? How much are you smoking? You doin' everyday or? You do it at work? Dude.
17.cn: 哦。你说这个？一罐健康有机的牛至？你吸了多少？每天都吸吗还是？工作时候抽？老兄。

18.en: When the oil's smoking, add some chopped garlic and chilli. Garlic, ginger, chillies, the holy trinity of Chinese cooking.
18.cn: 当油开始冒烟时，加入切好的蒜和辣椒。蒜、姜和辣椒是中餐烹调的三味一体。

19.en: You take Nick and Jordan. I suppose you can, yes. We'll meet you at the Plaza. I'll be the man on the corner smoking two cigarettes!
19.cn: 你载着尼克和乔丹。好啊，咱们饭店见，我肯定比你们先到！
